overview: An unconditional love story of a young girl who gambles, steals and ventures into the streets to pay off her fatherâ€™s gambling debts so he can come back home. Her devotion begins to shift when she is talked into seeing the value of an education by a pompous and relentless neighbor. Her sense of purpose and imagination creates a fictional but real person who acts as her subconscious, enabling her to navigate her reality.
title: Where I Come From
